products.product_title: Prosmart Concepts Visual Ear Cleaner Endoscope Kit with Mini Camera
products.product_description: A visual ear cleaner endoscope kit featuring a mini camera with LED illumination for examining the ear canal. Connects to smartphones or computers for real-time viewing. Includes interchangeable cleaning tips and is suitable for earwax inspection, nose examination, and general ear care. Model number 196 by Prosmart Concepts.

products.product_title: i96 High-Definition Visual Ear Cleaner with LED and Smartphone Connectivity
products.product_description: A visual ear cleaning device equipped with an HD camera and LED lights for safe, real-time inspection of the ear canal. Model i96, designed to connect with smartphone apps for live video viewing. Useful for monitoring earwax buildup and general ear health.

products.product_title: Portable Digital Skin Moisture & Oil Analyzer with LCD Display
products.product_description: A portable digital skin analyzer that uses Bioelectric Impedance Analysis (BIA) to measure skin moisture and oil levels. Features an LCD screen for quick readings and is suitable for home, travel, or salon use. Helps users track skin hydration and select appropriate skincare products.

products.product_title: Cipla 8X-KT Advanced Scalp Care Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
products.product_description: An anti-dandruff and seborrheic dermatitis treatment shampoo by Cipla containing Ketoconazole 2% w/v and Zinc Pyrithione. Helps control dandruff, reduce flakes, relieve itching, and target fungus causing scalp infections. Recommended for external use only.

products.product_title: ARVS Manual Needle & Syringe Destroyer with ABS Body
products.product_description: A manual syringe needle destroyer designed to safely dispose of used needles and prevent accidental needlestick injuries. Features a durable ABS plastic body and a manual cutting mechanism. Suitable for safe disposal in clinics, labs, and hospitals.

products.product_title: Glenmark Pharma Educational Box on Fungal Infections & Seborrheic Dermatitis
products.product_description: A promotional educational box from Glenmark highlighting that fungal infections can extend beyond the scalp and require comprehensive treatment. Focuses on conditions like Seborrheic Dermatitis and encourages complete care.

products.product_title: Ipca Acne-UV Silicone Gel Sunscreen (SPF 30/50) & Acne-UV Gold Gel Cream SPF 100
products.product_description: A range of dermatologically tested sunscreens by Ipca Laboratories formulated for oily and acne-prone skin. Offers broad spectrum protection from UVA/UVB rays, with the Gold variant also defending against cyan, visible, and infrared light. Non-comedogenic and water-resistant.

products.product_title: Azithral Azithromycin Oral Suspension by Alembic Pharmaceuticals
products.product_description: Azithral Liquid is an antibiotic suspension containing Azithromycin, used to treat infections of the respiratory tract, ear, nose, throat, skin, lungs, and eyes. Available in multiple strengths and requires a medical prescription.

products.product_title: Stamlo Amlodipine Tablets by Dr. Reddy’s Laboratories
products.product_description: Stamlo is India's leading Amlodipine brand used to treat hypertension and prevent angina. It works by relaxing and widening blood vessels, improving blood flow. Available in 2.5 mg, 5 mg, and 10 mg strengths.

products.product_title: Total Pillow Microbead Twistable Support Cushion
products.product_description: A versatile, twistable microbead pillow designed for neck, back, and lumbar support. Can be shaped into multiple forms for comfort during travel, office work, or at home. Covered in soft fleece fabric.

products.product_title: Single-Use Sterile Disposable Dermal Biopsy Punch – Yellow Variant
products.product_description: A sterile, single-use disposable dermal biopsy punch used for dermatology and surgical procedures. The yellow color signifies a specific size variant. Packaged in a sealed sterile pouch.

products.product_title: Bosch AquaSurf 250 Patio Cleaner Attachment
products.product_description: The Bosch AquaSurf 250 is a pressure washer attachment designed for cleaning patios and driveways. It features a 250 mm wide cleaning head, pivoting joint for maneuverability, and brush skirt splash guard. Compatible with various Bosch EasyAquatak, UniversalAquatak, and AQT washer models.

products.product_title: Dispo Van Disposable Hypodermic Syringe – Ribbon Pack
products.product_description: A single-use hypodermic syringe manufactured by Dispo Van, designed for safe medical injections and fluid withdrawal. Comes in ribbon pack packaging.

products.product_title: TH-8016 Portable LED Magnifying Glass with Scale (10X–20X)
products.product_description: A handheld magnifying glass featuring 10X, 15X, and 20X magnification with integrated LED and UV lighting. Includes a measurement scale, ideal for jewelry inspection, banknote checking, and detailed analysis.

products.product_title: MYPLAST Sample Vials by Gopala Polyplast
products.product_description: Small plastic vials manufactured by Gopala Polyplast Limited under the MYPLAST brand. Typically used for medical, industrial, or laboratory sampling purposes. Some containers are marked as 'Not to be Sold'.

products.product_name: Explore Science Human Anatomy Bone Assembly Kit
products.product_title: Explore Science 3D Human Anatomy Bone Assembly STEAM Kit
products.product_description: A STEAM educational kit designed to teach children about the human skeleton through a 3D bone assembly model. Ideal for early biology learning, anatomy exploration, and interactive science activities.

products.product_title: Human Skin Anatomy Study Frame
products.product_description: A printed skin anatomy chart frame showing epidermis, dermis, and subcutaneous layers. Suitable for educational, medical, or classroom use.
